Summary: The most amazing thing that has ever happened in my life.It was like time stopped and the sky opened up!
trends: There have been 49 other sightings in Huntington Beach
There were no other sightings in Huntington Beach on or around October 14th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a Sunday night OCT 14 2012 around 11:30 coming home from band practice from Hollywood going down the 605 south to the 405 south.I wasn't driving and usually don't talk much on the way home because its a long tiring day.I looked in the sky to the right of me toward the ocean and what appeared at first to be a helecopter going slow toward the ocean,suddenly it illuminated and pulsated a bright oranges yellow and turned to the north suddenly.The next thing I observed is the weirdest thing I have ever seen the object was a white orb with 4 disc shaped objects connected to it with orange yellow lights moving around the white orb at mind boggling speed,suddenly it turned all white pulsated and when that happened a giant beam of white light came vertical to the ground and sideways,suddenly time stopped and the object flew so fast a hole in the sky opened and i heard almost like a sonic boom and a red flash of light came from the object a half mile in each direction towards the ocean towards the car and all the light was sucked in to the hole into the sky and it was gone.I felt like I seen divine intervention I was almost frantic.I told my singer that was in the car but he is a scientist and refused to look.But right after this sighting we some how missed our off ramp to the 405 with a 20 minute time lapse.So we exit the freeway and I seen the white orb object with 4 orange disc circled around it.This time I ask my singer to look and he says whatever and this time numerous helecopters circling the object.We get back on the 405 and I see nothing until I return home and here is what i saw.There are U.F.O.'S I never believed in this stuff but they are real.But my sighting was a up lifting experience and hope people in the world can see what I seen.I didn't have a camera on the freeway for the amazing thing I saw but no one can deny this footage.THANKS EVERYONE LIFE IS GOOD!
